warp_kick.name: Warp Kick
warp_kick.desc: Perform a kick, then warp to your enemies for a second followup kick.

sovereign_drive.name: Sovereign Drive
sovereign_drive.desc: Dash forward in a blink, knocking down enemies in your path.

skycrash.name: Skycrash
skycrash.desc: Leap towards your enemies and stomp, knocking up enemies caught.
